function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overcrowding due to maximum number of occupants constraints","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases transmission, difficulty in maintaining physical distancing","Mitigation":"Implement strict occupancy limits, staggered schedules, and remote learning options","Technologies":"Occupancy tracking systems, scheduling software, video conferencing tools","People":"Building occupants, students, teachers, staff","Owner":"Building management, school administration"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in classrooms","Impact":"Limited air circulation, higher risk of airborne transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Improvement of ventilation systems, use of air purifiers, opening windows","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, window control systems","People":"Building occupants, students, teachers, staff","Owner":"Building management, school administration"},{"Description":"Inefficient building orientation for solar energy utilization","Impact":"Increased reliance on artificial lighting and HVAC systems, higher energy costs","Mitigation":"Optimize building orientation for solar energy, use of energy-efficient lighting and HVAC systems","Technologies":"Building energy simulation software, building orientation analysis tools, energy-efficient HVAC systems","People":"Building occupants, facilities management","Owner":"Building management"}]}
